Package com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode

Class DAABB

java.lang.Object
com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode.DAABB
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAABBC
public class DAABB extends Object implements DAABBC
Convenience class for operations on AABB (Axis-aligned bounding boxes).

Axes are numbered from 0 to 2.

See Also:
